title: Nifty: Steeper Slide Ahead, While Trump’s Warning Weighs
text:
On analysis of the movements of , in different time frames, I find that a resulted in the steep slide on September 3rd, 2019; which resulted in a nose dive move by Nifty 50 up to the level of 10,737. No doubt that the Nifty has already been passing through a crucial phase of ; U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday that trade talks between the United States and China were going well, though he warned that he would be "tougher" in negotiations if the discussions drag on until his second term.

"We are doing very well in our negotiations with China," Trump wrote in a post on Twitter, arguing that Beijing could ill afford to drag its feet in talks, given the damage U.S. tariffs were inflicting on its economy.

He did not provide details about the negotiations or how they could become tougher. Trump said if the United States and China did not resolve their trade dispute and he won re-election, "Deal would get MUCH TOUGHER! In the meantime, China's Supply Chain will crumble and businesses, jobs and money will be gone!"
